class.name: OpenXRFbSpatialEntityUser
class.brief_description: Represents a remote user registered with Meta's platform.
class.description: Represents a remote user registered with Meta's platform. [OpenXRFbSpatialEntity] objects which have been stored in the cloud can be shared with remote users in order to create multiplayer co-located experiences, where multiple users with headsets in the same physical space can interact with the same virtual objects.

method.name: create_user
method.description: Creates an [OpenXRFbSpatialEntityUser] from the given user ID.
